Beer - Class in edu.rit.p3.data.entity
This class represents the entity that is a beer.

BeerController - Class in edu.rit.p3.web
The instance of the BeerController class acts as the BUSINESS LAYER for the Beer Service.
BeerController(BeerJdbcManager, Calendar, Calendar, int) - Constructor for class edu.rit.p3.web.BeerController
 
BeerJdbcManager - Class in edu.rit.p3.data
The instance of BeerJdbcManager serves as the DATA LAYER.
BeerJdbcManager(DataSource, String) - Constructor for class edu.rit.p3.data.BeerJdbcManager
 
beerMapper - Variable in class edu.rit.p3.data.BeerJdbcManager
 
BeerMapper - Class in edu.rit.p3.data.entity.mapper
An instance of BeerMapper is used by the BeerJdbcManager (Data Layer) to more efficiently extract Beer entities from a given MySQL ResultSet.
BeerMapper() - Constructor for class edu.rit.p3.data.entity.mapper.BeerMapper
 
BeerNotFoundException - Exception in edu.rit.p3.data.exception
Within some methods of the BeerJdbcManager (Data Layer), an attempt at finding a Beer with a certain name may not exist.
BeerNotFoundException(String) - Constructor for exception edu.rit.p3.data.exception.BeerNotFoundException
 
BeerService - Class in edu.rit.p3
The BeerService class acts as the SERVICE LAYER and has the WebService annotation.
BeerService() - Constructor for class edu.rit.p3.BeerService
 
BeerServiceClosedException - Exception in edu.rit.p3.data.exception
Within the BeerJdbcManager methods (Data Layer), if a user attempts to perform an action that requires authentication, the token string they pass may be expired.
BeerServiceClosedException(Interval) - Constructor for exception edu.rit.p3.data.exception.BeerServiceClosedException
